name: Default
description: A balanced weather system suitable for most fantasy campaigns.

spring.name: Spring
spring.description: A season of renewal and moderate weather.

summer.name: Summer
summer.description: The hottest season with increased humidity and potential for storms.

autumn.name: Autumn
autumn.description: Cooling temperatures and increased wind bring changing weather patterns.

winter.name: Winter
winter.description: Cold temperatures and potential for snow and ice.

rules.effect: DC 5 Constitution save each hour (increases by 1 per hour) or gain 1 Exhaustion level. Creatures wearing Medium/Heavy armor have Disadvantage. Creatures with Fire Resistance/Immunity automatically succeed.
DC 10 Constitution save each hour or gain 1 Exhaustion level. Creatures with Cold Resistance/Immunity automatically succeed.

A strong wind imposes Disadvantage on ranged attack rolls with weapons. It also extinguishes open flames and disperses fog. A flying creature in a strong wind must land at the end of its turn or fall. A strong wind in a desert can create a sandstorm that imposes Disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.
Everything within an area of heavy rain or heavy snowfall is Lightly Obscured, and creatures in the area have Disadvantage on all Wisdom (Perception) checks. Heavy rain also extinguishes open flames.

arctic.name: Arctic Tundra
arctic.description: Frozen wasteland with permafrost and sparse vegetation. Extreme cold and strong winds are common.
rules: Movement is Difficult terrain in deep snow

seaOfSilt.name: Sea of Silt
seaOfSilt.description: A vast expanse of fine, powdery silt that behaves like a liquid. Extreme heat and strong winds create dangerous conditions.
rules: Creatures without eye protection have Disadvantage on Perception checks during the day
DC 10 Constitution save each hour or gain 1 Exhaustion level due to heat
Creatures can become trapped in the silt if they fail a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) check

subarctic.name: Subarctic Taiga
subarctic.description: Cold forest region with long winters and short summers. Dense coniferous forests dominate.
rules: Movement is Difficult terrain in deep snow

temperate.name: Temperate Forest
temperate.description: Mild climate with distinct seasons. Deciduous forests with moderate rainfall.

mediterranean.name: Mediterranean
mediterranean.description: Hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters. Coastal climate with scrub vegetation.

desert.name: Desert
desert.description: Arid region with extreme temperature variations between day and night.
rules: Creatures without eye protection have Disadvantage on Perception checks during the day

savanna.name: Savanna
savanna.description: Tropical grassland with distinct wet and dry seasons.

tropical.name: Tropical Rainforest
tropical.description: Hot, humid climate with heavy rainfall and dense vegetation.

mountain.name: Mountain
mountain.description: High elevation terrain with variable weather based on altitude.
rules: High Altitude: Each hour counts as 2 hours for travel purposes
Creatures can become acclimated after 30 days at this elevation

coastal.name: Coastal
coastal.description: Ocean-adjacent terrain with moderate temperatures and high humidity.

swamp.name: Swamp
swamp.description: Wetland with standing water, high humidity, and dense vegetation.
